questionTitle: I swim well, and so ___ my sister.
The dollar has risen against the yen, and so ___ the pound.
The detective has already solved the crime, and so ___ the police.
The Smiths' kids are tired of being kept indoors, and so ___ their cousins.
The boy was allowed to leave at 10 am, and so ___ the girl.
I can remember all their names, and so ___ my teacher.
Joyce should study math, and so ___ her brother.
Our hotel is within walking distance, and so ___ our club.
He works at the theater, and so ___ his wife.
Bob's parents were astonished by their child's determination, and so ___ his grandfather.
